Name: maximize_delivered_story_points
Description: Maximize total story points of user stories planned into sprint backlogs

Name: minimize_total_task_effort
Description: Minimize total effort of tasks selected on boards

Name: minimize_blocker_impact
Description: Minimize weighted impact (severity) of blocked tasks that are planned

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Maximize achievement of sprint goals across sprints

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Maximize average story points per sprint per team

Name: minimize_product_backlog_size
Description: Minimize number of entries selected into Product Backlogs

Name: minimize_project_budget_consumption
Description: Minimize proxy of project budget consumed by assigned teams

Name: maximize_priority_of_released_features
Description: Maximize sum of priorities for features included in release plans

Name: maximize_stakeholder_participation_impact
Description: Maximize influence-weighted stakeholder participation in Sprint Reviews

Name: maximize_team_satisfaction
Description: Maximize team satisfaction recorded in sprint retrospectives

Name: minimize_unfinished_tasks_on_board
Description: Minimize the number of non-done tasks that are placed on boards

Name: maximize_test_pass_rate
Description: Maximize (proxy) share of passed test statuses in development snapshots
